department: public works and government services canada
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
===========

### Tender Information

| Field            | Value    |
|------------------|----------|
| Reference Number | PW-MC-047-29195 |
| Solicitation Number | W8472-245912/A |
| Tender Status    | Cancelled |

### Tender Details

* **Public Works and Government Services Canada** invites bidders for a procurement of **Small Craft** services.
* The procurement will be conducted through a **Competitive - Selective tendering** process.
* The proposed contract will be funded under the **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.
* Bid submission is not possible as the tender has been cancelled.

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Rhéaume, Martin
* **Contact Email:** [martin.rheaume@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:martin.rheaume@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone:** (873) 455-4932
* **Contact Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5

### Regional Details

The procurement will cover services for **Department of National Defence**.

### regions Of Opportunity

This tender covers the following regions: **British Columbia, Nova Scotia**.
 
Note: this required a close read of contract details, it appears the contractor than provided an incorrectly worded response.
Full details abd clarification can be reached if you reach out and request so. Kindly get in touch with us for this tender.
